description: This file contains data model definitions for a food delivery app, including entities such as Restaurant, MenuItem, variants, add-ons, and cart configuration logic.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Represents a restaurant shown on the Home screen.

classes.name: MenuCategory
classes.description: Represents a menu category within a restaurant.

classes.name: OptionItem
classes.description: A single selectable option belonging to either a VariantGroup or AddOnGroup, including price delta.

classes.name: VariantGroup
classes.description: Single-select group for variants like Size or Spice level, with options and requirement flag.

classes.name: AddOnGroup
classes.description: Multi-select group for add-ons like extra cheese, with min/max selections and options.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a menu item available for order, including pricing, variants, and add-ons.

classes.name: ItemConfiguration
classes.description: Captures the selected options/configuration for a menu item in the cart.

classes.name: CartLine
classes.description: A cart line item combining a menu item, its configuration, quantity, and notes.

methods.name: computeOptionsDeltaCents
methods.description: Computes total price delta in cents based on selected options for variants and add-ons.

methods.name: buildConfigurationSummary
methods.description: Creates a human-readable string summarizing selected options for display.
